attributes.action: Introduce a common grading standard for local authority recycling to enable manufacturers to use a common symbol to identify if and in what way something, specifically packaging, can be recycled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present each local authority has its own standards about what can and can't be recycled so manufacturers can not give definitive advice on disposing of their packaging. A common system would enable specific items to be labeled as recyclable depending on the actual recycling facilities available locally
